Class ImageViewerGUI

java.lang.Object
  ImageViewerGUI

public class ImageViewerGUI
extends java.lang.Object

ImageViewerGUI provides the GUI for the project. It displays the image and strings, and it listens to button clicks.

Constructor Summary
ImageViewerGUI(ImageViewer viewer)
          Create an ImageViewer and display its GUI on screen.

Method Detail

setImageSize

public void setImageSize(int width,
                         int height)
Set a fixed size for image display. If set, this size will be used for all images. If not set, the GUI will resize for each image.
